pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `regions` ( `id_region` int(11) NOT NULL, `name` varchar(40) NOT NULL, `description` varchar(150) NOT NULL, `photo` varchar(200) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id_region`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci;
